topics.title: 仮定法過去
topics.summary: 現実と異なる現在の仮定。if + 過去形, would/could + 動詞原形
patterns: If + S + V(past), S + would/could + V(base).
topics.notes: 妄想（ありえないこと）のニュアンスを含む。例: If I were you, ...

topics.title: 仮定法過去完了
topics.summary: 現実と異なる過去の仮定。if + had + p.p., would/could have + p.p.
patterns: If + S + had + p.p., S + would/could have + p.p.
topics.notes: 過去の事実と反対。例: If I had left earlier, ...
